divs: Sighting Detailsi was filming the night sky trying to catch a weird flash and these white lights appeared after review of the video they were not there originally. it amazed me to know that my camera phone could pick these lights up it was very dark and i dint expect to be able to pick up anything including the weird white flash of light.
